meanings.definition: The quality of being extremely beautiful or delicate.
meanings.sent1: The exquisiteness of the flower's petals was truly breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: She admired the exquisiteness of the intricate lacework on the dress.
meanings.sent3: The exquisiteness of the cake decoration made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had an exquisiteness that could calm even the most troubled souls.
meanings.sent5: The exquisiteness of the sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and gold.

meanings.definition: The state of being finely made or crafted.
meanings.sent1: The exquisiteness of the handmade jewelry was evident in every detail.
meanings.sent2: The exquisiteness of the wooden carving showcased the artist's skill.
meanings.sent3: The exquisiteness of the origami swan amazed the children.
meanings.sent4: His exquisiteness in pottery was unmatched in the village.
meanings.sent5: The exquisiteness of the embroidery on the pillow was a testament to the artisan's talent.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being exceptionally pleasing or delightful.
meanings.sent1: The exquisiteness of her smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent2: The exquisiteness of the melody brought tears to their eyes.
meanings.sent3: His exquisiteness in storytelling always captivated the audience.
meanings.sent4: The exquisiteness of the garden filled the air with a sweet fragrance.
meanings.sent5: The exquisiteness of the painting left viewers in awe of its beauty.
